evidence.text: IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and caused the Great Seal of the State of Florida to be affixed at Tallahassee, this 4th day of August, 2022.
which period shall be from the effective date hereof, until a further executive order is issued, or as otherwise provided by law.

extracted.value: Until a further executive order is issued: Executive Order of Suspension

evidence.text: Andrew Warren is hereby suspended from the public office that he now holds, to wit: State Attorney for the 13th Judicial Circuit of Florida.

Andrew Warren is hereby prohibited from performing any official act, duty, or function of public office; from receiving any pay or allowance; from being entitled to any of the emoluments or privileges of public office during the period of this suspension.

extracted.value: Suspended from office as State Attorney for the 13th Judicial Circuit; prohibited from performing any official act, duty, or function; prohibited from receiving pay or emoluments during suspension period
